name: withConn
typ: HasIO io => String -> (Conn -> io b) -> (ConnectionStatus -> io b) -> io b

name: Exec
typ: (Connection -> IO a) -> Database a Open (const Open)

name: DIO
typ: IO a -> Database a s1 (const s1)

name: Bind
typ: Database a s1 s2Fn -> ((x : a) -> Database b (s2Fn x) s3Fn) -> Database b s1 s3Fn

name: liftIO'
typ: IO a -> Database a s1 (const s1)

name: evalDatabase
typ: HasIO io => Database a Closed (const Closed) -> io a

name: exec
typ: (Connection -> IO a) -> Database a Open (const Open)

name: unsafeExec
typ: (Conn -> IO a) -> Database a Open (const Open)

name: withDB
typ: HasIO io => String -> Database a Open (const Open) -> io (Either String a)

name: stringQuery
typ: (header : Bool) -> String -> Connection -> IO (Either String (StringResultset header))

name: expectedQuery
typ: (expected : Vect cols Type) -> String -> All Castable expected => Connection -> IO (Either String (rowCount : Nat ** Vect rowCount (HVect expected)))

name: tableQuery
typ: {auto {conArg:2942} : PostgresTable t} -> (table : t) -> (cols : Vect n (ColumnIdentifier, Type)) -> HasMappings IdrCast table cols => Connection -> IO (Either String (rowCount : Nat ** Vect rowCount (HVect (snd <$> cols))))

name: tableQuery'
typ: {auto {conArg:3028} : PostgresTable t} -> (table : t) -> (cols : Vect n (String, Type)) -> HasMappings IdrCast table (mapFst (MkColumnId (aliasOrName table)) <$> cols) => Connection -> IO (Either String (rowCount : Nat ** Vect rowCount (HVect (snd <$> (mapFst (MkColumnId (aliasOrName table)) <$> cols)))))

name: tableInsert
typ: (table : PersistedTable) -> (cols : Vect n ColumnIdentifier) -> HVect colTypes -> HasLooseMappings PGCast table (cols `zip` colTypes) => Connection -> IO ResultStatus

name: withExecResult
typ: Conn -> String -> (Result -> IO b) -> IO b

name: pgStringResultsQuery
typ: TypeDictionary => (header : Bool) -> String -> Conn -> IO (Either String (StringResultset header))

name: pgResultQuery
typ: TypeDictionary => (expected : Vect colCount Type) -> String -> Conn -> All Castable expected => IO (Either String (rowCount : Nat ** Vect rowCount (HVect expected)))

name: withResult
typ: ResultProducer source a => source -> a -> (Result -> IO b) -> IO b

name: pgResultStringValue
typ: TupleResult rows cols -> Fin rows -> Fin cols -> String

name: pgResultNullableStringValue
typ: TupleResult rows cols -> Fin rows -> Fin cols -> Maybe String

name: pgStringResultset
typ: TupleResult rows cols -> Vect rows (Vect cols (Lazy String))

name: pgNullableStringResultset
typ: TupleResult rows cols -> Vect rows (Vect cols (Lazy (Maybe String)))

name: pgResultsetColNames
typ: TupleResult rows cols -> Vect cols String

name: pgResultsetColTypes
typ: TypeDictionary => TupleResult rows cols -> Vect cols PType

name: asDefaultType
typ: Castable t -> Maybe String -> Either String t

name: PT
typ: String -> {default Nothing _ : Maybe Alias} -> List (String, Exists PColType) -> PersistedTable

name: LooseColumnMapping
typ: (0 _ : (PType -> Type -> Type)) -> List (ColumnIdentifier, Exists PColType) -> (ColumnIdentifier, Type) -> Type

name: HereNul
typ: (ident : ColumnIdentifier) -> (ty : Type) -> castTy pt ty => LooseColumnMapping castTy ((ident, Evidence pt (MkColType Nullable pt)) :: xs) (ident, Maybe ty)

name: HereNulLoose
typ: (columnName : String) -> (ty : Type) -> castTy pt ty => LooseColumnMapping castTy ((MkColumnId {_:10556} columnName, Evidence pt (MkColType Nullable pt)) :: xs) (MkColumnId Nothing columnName, Maybe ty)

name: Here
typ: (ident : ColumnIdentifier) -> (ty : Type) -> castTy pt ty => LooseColumnMapping castTy ((ident, Evidence pt (MkColType NonNullable pt)) :: xs) (ident, ty)

name: HereLoose
typ: (columnName : String) -> (ty : Type) -> castTy pt ty => LooseColumnMapping castTy ((MkColumnId {_:10643} columnName, Evidence pt (MkColType NonNullable pt)) :: xs) (MkColumnId Nothing columnName, ty)

name: There
typ: LooseColumnMapping castTy xs (ident, ty) -> LooseColumnMapping castTy (x :: xs) (ident, ty)

name: HasLooseMappings
typ: (0 _ : (PType -> Type -> Type)) -> PostgresTable t => t -> Vect n (ColumnIdentifier, Type) -> Type

name: ColumnMapping
typ: (0 _ : (PType -> Type -> Type)) -> List (ColumnIdentifier, Exists PColType) -> (ColumnIdentifier, Type) -> Type

name: HasMappings
typ: (0 _ : (PType -> Type -> Type)) -> PostgresTable t => t -> Vect n (ColumnIdentifier, Type) -> Type

name: select
typ: {auto {conArg:11089} : PostgresTable t} -> (table : t) -> (cols : Vect n (ColumnIdentifier, Type)) -> {auto 0 _ : HasMappings IdrCast table cols} -> String

name: insert
typ: (table : PersistedTable) -> (cols : Vect n ColumnIdentifier) -> HVect colTypes -> HasLooseMappings PGCast table (cols `zip` colTypes) => String

name: On
typ: {auto {conArg:11386} : PostgresTable t} -> {auto {conArg:11389} : PostgresTable u} -> (c1 : ColumnIdentifier) -> (c2 : ColumnIdentifier) -> {auto 0 _ : Elem c1 (fst <$> columns t1)} -> {auto 0 _ : Elem c2 (fst <$> columns t2)} -> Join t1 t2

name: elemForOnMapping
typ: {auto {conArg:11496} : PostgresTable t} -> (table : t) -> (c : ColumnIdentifier) -> HasOnMapping c table -> (c' : ColumnIdentifier ** Elem c' (fst <$> columns table))
{auto {conArg:11566} : PostgresTable t} -> {auto {conArg:11569} : PostgresTable u} -> (c1 : ColumnIdentifier) -> (c2 : ColumnIdentifier) -> HasOnMapping c1 t1 => HasOnMapping c2 t2 => Join t1 t2

name: innerJoin'
typ: PostgresTable t => (table1 : t) -> PostgresTable u => (table2 : u) -> Join table1 table2 -> RuntimeTable

name: leftJoin'
typ: PostgresTable t => (table1 : t) -> PostgresTable u => (table2 : u) -> Join table1 table2 -> RuntimeTable

name: rightJoin'
typ: PostgresTable t => (table1 : t) -> PostgresTable u => (table2 : u) -> Join table1 table2 -> RuntimeTable

name: MkTP
typ: JoinType -> PostgresTable t => PostgresTable u => (table1 : t) -> (table2 : u) -> TablePair table1 table2

name: innerJoin
typ: PostgresTable t => PostgresTable u => (table1 : t) -> (table2 : u) -> TablePair table1 table2

name: leftJoin
typ: PostgresTable t => PostgresTable u => (table1 : t) -> (table2 : u) -> TablePair table1 table2

name: rightJoin
typ: PostgresTable t => PostgresTable u => (table1 : t) -> (table2 : u) -> TablePair table1 table2

name: onColumns
typ: TablePair table1 table2 -> Join table1 table2 -> RuntimeTable

name: allCastable
typ: {auto {conArg:12468} : PostgresTable t} -> (table : t) -> HasMappings IdrCast table cols => All Castable (snd <$> cols)

name: pgLoadTypes
typ: HasIO io => Conn -> io (Either String TypeDictionary)
